mapper.select: /* 회원목록조회 */ SELECT m.member_id, mwhd.mentor_POWK_NM, mwhd.mentor_TKCG_TASK, mwhd.FRST_REG_DT FROM member_level ml INNER join member m on ml.member_level_code=m.member_level_code INNER join mentor_work_history_details mwhd on m.member_id=mwhd.member_id WHERE ml.member_level_name='멘토';
